subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Marin Cilic reached the semifinals of his third straight tournament, beating Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 6-4, at the Zagreb Indoors in Croatia.
snippet: The defending champion Marin Cilic reached the semifinals of his third straight tournament, beating Ivo Karlovic, 7-6 (6), 6-4, at the Zagreb Indoors in Croatia.
